revision.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/Marco Papavero|Marco Papavero]] ([[User talk:Marco Papavero|talk]]) to last revision by [[User:imported>M86|imported>M86]]
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ZBT |model=WE826 |revision=B0 |price=25 |fcc_date=05/18/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=new |type=wireless router, mobile router |fcc_id=2AH9TW826 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FVSIG |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W971GG6KB-25 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCIe, Micro SD card slot |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, debug |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=ZBT WN2522 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612EN |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink UBoot; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.14;OpenWrt (Mediatek SDK); |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, LEDE Project, Padavan (unofficially), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=root }} '''N300/AC1200 Wireless Router''' :[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/router/ZBT-WE826-B.html Product page]
"ZBT-WE826_B0" and "ZBT-WN2522" is silkscreened on the board.
*[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/zbt/we-826 ''ZBT WE826'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://www.cebit.de/product/zbt-we826/2040372/L364619 ''ZBT-WE826'' on '''CeBIT'''] <small> '''Note''': Original device is coming with empty mpci-e slot but can be supplied with MT7612E ::radio card or 3G/4G modem card (SIM card slot soldered on PCB bottom). </small> ===Key features=== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] [[MediaTek_MT7620A|MT7620A]] @580MHz (RevID: 0206) *RAM: 128MB (DDR2), Flash: 16MB (SPI NOR) *2.4GHz Wi-Fi (supports 802.11bgn, up to 300Mbps) *Optional 5GHz Wi-Fi (supports 802.11abgn/ac, up to 867Mbps) *1x USB 2.0, 1x microSD, 1x Mini PCIe *4-pins serial debug port header
===Hardware mods=== :This board uses [http://elinux.org/images/e/ee/FE11-datasheet.pdf FE1.1s USB 2.0 HUB] (4 ports) chip providing :front USB port and MiniPCIe usb interface (for 3G/4G modem). :2 other ports are free and can be used for hardware mods.
===See also=== *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/router/we126.html ZBT WE126] MediaTek MT7620N @580MHz :Flash: 8MB, RAM: 64MB, USB 2.0, 2.4GHz, 802.11bgn 2T2R, 5x FE *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/router/WE526.html ZBT WE526] MediaTek MT7620N @580MHz :Flash: 8MB, RAM: 64MB, 2.4GHz, 802.11bgn 2T2R, 5x FE *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/router/ZBT-WE826T.html ZBT WE826T] MediaTek MT7620A @580MHz :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 128MB, USB 2.0, 2.4MHz, 802.11bgn 2T2R, 5x FE, 3G/4G *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/router/WE1026.html ZBT WE1026] MediaTek MT7620A @580MHz :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 128MB, USB 2.0, 2.4MHz, 802.11bgn 2T2R, 5x FE *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/ZBT-WE1426.html ZBT WE1426] MediaTek MT7620N @580MHz :Flash: 4MB, RAM: 32MB, 2.4GHz, 802.11bgn 2T2R, 5x FE *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/router/ZBT-WE1626.html ZBT WE1626] MediaTek MT7620N @580MHz :Flash: 8MB, RAM: 64MB, 2.4GHz, 802.11bgn 2T2R, 5x FE *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/router/ZBT-WE1826.html ZBT WE1826] MediaTek MT7620A @580MHz :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 128MB, USB 2.0, 2.4/5GHz, 802.11abgn/ac 2T2R, 5x FE *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/router/ZBT-WE2026.html ZBT WE2026] MediaTek MT7620N @580MHz :Flash: 8MB, RAM: 64MB, 2.4GHz, 802.11bgn 2T2R, 5x FE *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/ZBT-WG2626.html ZBT WG2626] MediaTek MT7621AT @880MHz :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 512MB, USB 3.0, 802.11abgn/ac 2T2R, 5x GbE *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/router/ZBT-WG2926.html ZBT WG2926] MediaTek MT7621AT @880MHz :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 512MB, USB 3.0, SATA, 802.11abgn/ac 2T2R, 5x GbE
==Images== <gallery> File:826 board top.jpeg| Board top File:826 board bottom.jpeg| Board bottom File:826 with 5g card.jpeg| With 5G MT7612E card installed File:826 5g card close.jpeg| 5G card close </gallery> [[Has images::internal| ]]
